meanings.definition: A tuft of hair that grows in a different direction from the rest.
meanings.sent1: Her curly hair had a few cowlicks that refused to lay flat.
meanings.sent2: The barber had to work extra to tame the cowlicks at the back of his head.
meanings.sent3: The cowlicks on his head seemed to have a mind of their own, always sticking up.
meanings.sent4: The cowlicks on her crown were like rebellious strands, defying gravity.
meanings.sent5: The cowlicks on the toddler's head looked like little whirlwinds of hair.

meanings.definition: A stubborn lock of hair that stands up or falls in a different direction.
meanings.sent1: Despite using gel, his cowlicks still popped up at odd angles.
meanings.sent2: She tried to smooth down the cowlicks near her forehead with a brush.
meanings.sent3: The cowlicks on his head made him look like he had just woken up.
meanings.sent4: Her cowlicks were like tiny rebels amidst the orderly strands of hair.
meanings.sent5: The cowlicks on the puppy's fur gave him a playful, tousled look.
